content:
From: Lars Noschinski <noschinl@in.tum.de>
I read the document and got a few remarks:

  • Page 2, paragraph 2 there is a "." missing between "syntax" and "These".
  • Page 3, paragraph 1 of 1.3.1: undefined reference
  • Page 9, paragraph 1 of 2.1: undefined reference
  • Page 9, second lemma: "conclusion" probably ought to be bold
  • Page 10, first methode: "premises in" probably ought to be bold

  • Page 13, first lemma in 2.2: I read asms as "A ==> B A ==> D" instead
    as "A ==> B" "A ==> D". Maybe more space?

  • Page 16, first lemma in 2.4.2: "in" probably ought to be bold -- there
    a further instances of this formatting in the document

  • Page 20, paragraph 1: "cast distinction" -> "case distinction"

  • Page 20, paragraph 2: "fist matching" -> "first matching"

    -- Lars
